backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with access control, storage mixins, user, student, staff, finance, exams, SMS, and audit log types, plus authorization helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping implemented features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, routing, layout, and all module pages with auto-logout support.
frontend/src/components/admin/BackupRemi: React banner component showing a periodic backup reminder using localStorage and navigation to backup page.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserFormDi: Dialog form for creating a new user, handling input, validation, and submission via useCreateUser.
frontend/src/components/admissions/Stude: Dialog for creating or editing a student record, including personal details, class info, parent contacts, and photo upload.
frontend/src/components/auth/LogoutButto: Button that logs out the user by clearing identity data and React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Wrapper that restricts access to children based on allowed user roles and shows an error message if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/exams/MarksEntry: Dialog for adding exam marks, calculating grade, and submitting a new ExamRecord.
frontend/src/components/files/PhotoUploa: Component for uploading and previewing a photo using ExternalBlob with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/finance/Financia: Dialog for adding revenue or expense records with amount, description, and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout containing header, sidebar, offline banner, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying school info, contact details, copyright, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header showing app title, user role badge, user name, and logout button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNa: Renders a role‑aware sidebar navigation menu, showing links based on the current user's appRole and highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/offline/OfflineS: Displays an offline alert banner when the app detects loss of network connectivity.
frontend/src/components/sms/SMSTemplates: Provides predefined SMS templates and a helper to insert dynamic placeholder values into template text.
frontend/src/components/staff/StaffFormD: Modal dialog for creating or editing staff records, handling form state, photo upload, and submit mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current authenticated user's profile using the actor, exposing loading and refetch states.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardStats.ts: Computes dashboard metrics such as total active students, staff, classes, and fee totals based on fetched data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines query and mutation hooks for students, staff, and other backend resources using the actor and React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining design tokens, dark mode variables, and print-specific styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks online/offline browser status and exposes a simple hook returning connection state.
Admin page for headmasters to view audit logs in a table with timestamps, users, and actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BackupRestorePa: Admin interface for exporting and importing full system backups with file handling and status toasts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Headmaster-only page listing users, adding new ones, and disabling existing accounts.
frontend/src/pages/admissions/Admissions: Admissions management page enabling student search, creation, viewing, and deletion with role restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/admissions/StudentDet: Displays detailed student info with actions to print, transfer, or dismiss a student using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ChangePasswordPage.ts: React page providing a password change form with basic client-side validation and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/classes/ClassDetailPa: Shows all students in a selected class with a printable table of their details.
frontend/src/pages/classes/ClassesPage.t: Lists all classes with student counts, search, print, and CSV export features.
frontend/src/pages/classes/ParentsPage.t: Aggregates parents from student data and lists them with search, print, and CSV export options.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing user greeting, backup reminder, and key school statistics with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/exams/AnalyticsPage.t: Generates subject-wise average marks and displays them in a bar chart for exam analytics.
frontend/src/pages/exams/ExamsPage.tsx: Manages exam records with listing, deletion, marks entry dialog, and navigation to analytics and report cards.
frontend/src/pages/exams/StudentReportCa: Displays a student’s exam records, calculates average marks, and provides print/download options.
frontend/src/pages/finance/FinancePage.t: Shows revenue and expense records with tabs, allows adding and deleting records, and links to financial reports.
frontend/src/pages/finance/ReceiptPage.t: Renders a printable receipt for a specific financial record with amount, date, and description.
frontend/src/pages/finance/ReportsPage.t: Generates financial summaries and charts comparing revenue and expenses, with print support.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication and displays errors or loading state.
frontend/src/pages/sms/SMSHistoryPage.ts: Lists SMS logs with timestamps, receiver info, message previews, and delivery status.
frontend/src/pages/sms/SMSPage.tsx: Provides interfaces to send simulated individual or bulk SMS messages with templates and logs.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDetailPage: Shows detailed staff information including photo, position, and status, with print functionality.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDirectoryP: Renders a staff directory with search, add, view, and delete actions, loading staff via hooks and restricting access to headmasters.
frontend/src/security/useAutoLogout.ts: Implements an inactivity timer that logs out the user and clears React Query cache after 30 minutes of no input events.
frontend/src/utils/export.ts: Exports an array of objects to a downloadable CSV file by generating and triggering a blob download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, architecture notes, required images, and existing implemented features for the school management system.
